hakubishin.card_operations

クラス CardUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • hakubishin.card_operations.CardUtil

  • public class CardUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class generate Card set which used by card games When those cards are transmitted to another class which can have cards, this class must be used as like relay point

    • メソッドの詳細

      • createNewCards

        public void createNewCards(CardHub creater,
                           int jokerNumber)
        パラメータ:
        creater - Creater will have cards which this method creats.
        jokerNumber - Number of joker cards which will be created.

      • allFaceUp

        public void allFaceUp(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)

      • sendCard

        public boolean sendCard(Card card,
                        CardHub origin,
                        CardHub destination)
        When changing owner of cards, this method is the only way.
        パラメータ:
        card - card which is to send
        origin - where the card send from
        destination - where the card send to
        戻り値:
        if process succeeded, this method will return true. if false is backed, it means origin doesn't have the card
